DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of a new artificial tear for the treatment of dry eye that may occur after LASIK surgery
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of a New Artificial Tear for Use After LASIK Surgery
DOC.criteria: Candidate for bilateral LASIK surgery for myopia correction in the range of 1.00 to 8.00 diopters Dry eye signs and symptoms Preoperative soft or rigid contact lens wear within last 7 or 30 days, respectively Pregnancy or planning pregnancy Uncontrolled systemic disease Use of systemic medications affecting dry eye
